Articles.Content:
So, I asked on the IPS4 forums if BBcode is supported and also if 'Like this' can be changed into 'Add Reputation', and it appears it can on IPS4. Here is the thread I made there asking: https://community.invisionpower.com/topic/423623-a-few-questions-from-a-user/

Edited December 1, 2015 by legoclone09
What I've heard is that IPS4 natively supports BBcode, no plugins required.  It was just disabled slightly here.  I think that's Kevin 7 was confused.
BBCODE IS ALIVE HERE? WHERE?! I SEE NO BBCODE!!
hmm someone has enabled something I just observed as I was about to comment

It supports some BBCode but you can't see it after the fact, such as editing a post.  For people that post mod threads and contests and other such things where they go back and edit the first post repeatedly, that is important.

3 hours ago, Alshain said:

It supports some BBCode but you can't see it after the fact, such as editing a post.  For people that post mod threads and contests and other such things where they go back and edit the first post repeatedly, that is important.

Yes!

It really is a pain to format large posts in WYSIWYG, especially if you have lots of images.

If BB code, or any plain texteditor (HTML?) Is available, its totally needed.
